Articles.Content: Two days ago I was making it to Minmus, four days ago I was making it to the Mun for the first time. And today I made it to Duna for the first time. The SSTO was crewed by Jebediah and Bill and midway through the flight I noticed I was not in a transfer window but I ended up being able to get into a orbit around Duna and actually saw Ike for the first time.
Congrats! Plus, you can make it back...the first time I made it to Duna, I didn't have enough fuel...
